name: Notanant
overview:
Notanant hosts and runs instant-edit websites with built in social networking and e-commerce. Sites look like and work as normal websites with fully content management, yet can contain members, products, events and audio or video, all of which are manageable and controllable through permission-based access via a web-browser only.

Sites can be created instantly in just one click, and are taken up by small businesses looking for instant-edit websites that can be updated instantly, or clubs and associations where there are members. A developing area is the overlap between business and membership-based organisations, which need both members, sites with a custom identity and e-commerce such as product sales for members.

Notanant makes it easy for anyone to build a social networking niche platform and for businesses to harness the social power of the internet
